description: Dark Blast summons the powers of the Netherworld to defeat your foes. The draining effects of most of these powers can reduce your targets' chance to hit.

description.long: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

description.short: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing), Foe -To Hit, Knockback
description.long: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals Moderate Negative Energy damage and sends foes flying and reduces their chance to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

description.short: Sniper, Extreme DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +Range
description.long: An extremely long range and accurate beam of Negative Energy that deals tremendous damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. This is a sniper attack, and like most sniper attacks, is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. If you have more than 97% To-Hit, this attack becomes instant-cast. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

description.short: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Negative/Smash), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
description.long: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their chance to hit. Damage: Moderate(DoT)Recharge: Slow

description.short: Ranged, High DoT(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit
description.long: You gaze into your foe's eyes giving them a glimpse into the terrifying netherworld rendering them held, reducing their chance to hit and dealing High Negative Energy damage over the next couple of seconds. Damage: High Recharge: Slow

description.short: Ranged, High DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP
description.long: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive Negative Energy and Smashing damage and severely reducing affected foes' chance to hit.  Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
